body:
Can you run your program with this environment variable set

GODEBUG=gctrace=1

and include the output. Please mark on the output the points where

* clients disconnect
* memory usage falls to the expected level
* memory usage grows to the higher level.

Thanks

Dave

On Wed, Nov 25, 2015 at 1:41 PM, heidawei <notifications@github.com> wrote:
